You plan to visit 4 European cities for 13 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Geneva for 2 days. During day 7 and day 8, you have to attend a conference in Geneva. You plan to stay in Santorini for 2 days. You want to spend 6 days in Milan. You plan to stay in Split for 6 days. You plan to visit relatives in Split between day 8 and day 13.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Milan and Split, Geneva and Split, Santorini and Geneva, Milan and Santorini.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 13 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
